Data Structures

union  Data
 Union to store constraint data and current state.

Detailed Description

DrmConstraint defines a Count, DateTime, or Interval constraint according to OMA DRM.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DrmConstraint::Type
 

Type of constraint.

Enumerator:
None  No constraint defined.
TypeCount  Count constraint.
TypeDateTime  Date and time limit.
TypeInterval  Interval limited.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DrmConstraint::DoesApply (   )  const
 

DoesApply returns TRUE if the constraint applies. In that case content presentation must be prohibited.

INT DrmConstraint::OnContentConsumedEnd (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnContentConsumedEnd will update constraint internal state.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on update of internal constraint state

INT DrmConstraint::OnContentConsumedStart (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnContentConsumedStart will update constraint internal state to indicate start of content consumption.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on update of internal constraint state to indicate start of consumption

INT DrmConstraint::OnRollback (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnRollback will update constraint internal state.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on updation of internal constraint state

void DrmConstraint::SetStartDate (  UINT32  sec_start  ) 
 

Initialize for DateTime constraint

Parameters:
sec_start Start time and date in seconds (
See also:
DateTime). If no start time specified, set to 0 (zero)
Parameters:
sec_end End time and date in seconds (
See also:
DateTime). If no end time specified, set to 0xffffffff
